---
title: "Using Generative AI"
---

If you want to use generative ensure you are informed on its proper use.
We are still in the early days of LLMs and how they ultimately be used and the effect they have on the world is still to be determined.
Check your University's guidelines for the use of Generative AI and the resources they can provide.

Below is a an example link to University guidance:

[University of Liverpool's guidance on [Generative Artificial Intelligence in Teaching, Learning and Assessment](https://www.liverpool.ac.uk/centre-for-innovation-in-education/digital-education/generative-artificial-intelligence/)
